DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double-blind , control , parallel-group , multicenter , Phase-3 study evaluate efficacy safety ezetimibe simvastatin take alone subject ages 10-17 year Heterozygous Familial Hypercholesterolemia .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Ezetimibe With Simvastatin Therapy Adolescents With HeFH ( Study P02579 )
DOC.detailed_description: This study consist 3 distinct period . In Period 1 , subject receive daily treatment 6 week part either ezetimibe simvastatin group part simvastatin monotherapy group . Subjects ezetimibe simvastatin group receive one three treatment : coadministration ezetimibe 10 mg/day plus simvastatin 10 mg/day , 20 mg/day , 40 mg/day . Subjects simvastatin monotherapy group receive one three treatment : ezetimibe placebo plus simvastatin 10 mg/day , 20 mg/day , 40 mg/day . The primary key secondary efficacy analysis base evaluation perform Period 1 present data subject pool either ezetimibe simvastatin treatment group compare data subject pool simvastatin monotherapy treatment group . In Period 2 , subject receive ezetimibe 10 mg/day plus simvastatin 40 mg/day ezetimibe placebo plus simvastatin 40 mg/day 27 additional week maintain treatment assignment ( coadministration v monotherapy ) Period 1 . In Period 3 , subject receive ezetimibe 10 mg/day plus open-label simvastatin daily 20 week .
DOC.criteria: Adolescent ( age 10 17 year ) boys girls weigh least 88 lb ( 40 kg ) . Subjects must high cholesterol ( low density lipoprotein cholesterol [ LDLC ] 159 mg/dL 4.1 mmol/L ) family history high cholesterol . Subjects diagnose delayed puberty . Subjects sensitive simvastatin and/or ezetimibe . Subjects drink alcohol excessively history alcohol drug abuse within past 2 year . Subjects know HIV positive , undergoing LDL apheresis plasma apheresis , partial ileal bypass .
